summary: The module implements a DataTransferer class and supporting helper functions that serialize and deserialize arbitrary data containers. It determines whether objects can be dumped, registers custom dump/load handlers for special types (e.g., long integers, Unicode strings, None, simple scalars), optionally offloads large objects to subprocesses, and uses pickle/base64 encoding for transport.
business_intent: Provide a robust mechanism for moving Metaflow workflow data between isolated execution environments, ensuring that all supported data types are correctly encoded, transferred, and reconstructed without loss or errors.
